Title: Provides that in N.Y. city flashing purple lights may be affixed to and displayed on buses operated on a bus rapid transit route
Summary: Provides that in a city of one million or more, flashing purple lights may be affixed to and displayed on buses operated on a bus rapid transit route.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to providing that in a city of one million or more flashing purple lights may be affixed to and displayed on buses operated on a bus rapid transit route
